scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Meghan Smith
scrape.text: All dislikable characters, super-slow plot, lame mental illness 'Aspergers' reference which is infuriating given that violence isn't remotely a part of Autism. I didn't find it thrilling, and I'm a Gillian Flynn fan. I had a hard time getting into the book and finishing it was a slog.
